98 template <bool hasMachineParameters, class Scalar>
99 class RelErrSmallNumber {
100 public:
101  static Scalar smallNumber()
102  {
103  return ScalarTraits<Scalar>::ThisShouldNotCompile();
104  }
105 };
106 
107 
112 template <class Scalar>
113 class RelErrSmallNumber<false,Scalar> {
114 public:
115  static Scalar smallNumber()
116  {
117  return Scalar(1e-8);
118  }
119 };
120 
121 
126 template <class Scalar>
127 class RelErrSmallNumber<true,Scalar> {
128 public:
129  static Scalar smallNumber()
130  {
131  return Teuchos::ScalarTraits<Scalar>::eps();
132  }
133 };
134 
135 
140 template <class Scalar>
141 Scalar defaultSmallNumber()
142 {
143  const bool hasMachineParameters = ScalarTraits<Scalar>::hasMachineParameters;
144  return RelErrSmallNumber<hasMachineParameters,Scalar>::smallNumber();
145 }

230 #define TEUCHOS_PASS_FAIL(RESULT) \
231  Teuchos::passfail_with_location((RESULT), __FILE__, __LINE__)
232

240 #define TEUCHOS_ECHO( statement, out ) \
241  (out) << #statement ";\n"; \
242  statement;
243 
250 #define TEUCHOS_TEST_EQUALITY_CONST( v1, v2, out, success ) \
251  { \
252  (out) << #v1" = "<<Teuchos::toString(v1)<<" == "<<Teuchos::toString(v2)<<" : "; \
253  const bool l_result = (v1) == (v2); \
254  (out) << TEUCHOS_PASS_FAIL(l_result) << "\n"; \
255  if (!l_result) (success) = false; \
256  }
257 
264 #define TEUCHOS_TEST_ASSERT( v1, out, success ) \
265  { \
266  const bool l_result = v1; \
267  (out) << #v1" = "<<l_result<<" == true : "; \
268  (out) << TEUCHOS_PASS_FAIL(l_result) << "\n"; \
269  if (!l_result) (success) = false; \
270  }
271 
278 #define TEUCHOS_TEST_EQUALITY( v1, v2, out, success ) \
279  { \
280  (out) << #v1" = "<<Teuchos::toString(v1)<<" == "#v2" = "<<Teuchos::toString(v2)<<" : "; \
281  const bool l_result = (v1) == (v2); \
282  if (!l_result) (success) = false; \
283  (out) << TEUCHOS_PASS_FAIL(l_result) << "\n"; \
284  }

297  (out) << TEUCHOS_PASS_FAIL(l_result) << "\n"; \

323 #define TEUCHOS_TEST_FLOATING_EQUALITY( v1, v2, tol, out, success ) \
324  { \
325  const bool l_result = Teuchos::testRelErr( \
326  #v1, v1, #v2, v2, "tol", tol, "tol", tol, Teuchos::outArg(out) ); \
327  if (!l_result) (success) = false; \

341  { \
342  (out) << #iter1" == "#iter2" = : "; \
343  const bool l_result = (iter1) == (iter2); \
344  if (!l_result) (success) = false; \
345  (out) << TEUCHOS_PASS_FAIL(l_result) << "\n"; \

360  (out) << #iter1" != "#iter2" = : "; \
361  const bool l_result = (iter1) != (iter2); \
362  if (!l_result) (success) = false; \
363  (out) << TEUCHOS_PASS_FAIL(l_result) << "\n"; \
364  }

373 #define TEUCHOS_TEST_ARRAY_ELE_EQUALITY( a, i, val, printPass, out, success ) \
374  { \
375  const bool l_result = ( (a)[i] == (val) ); \
376  if (!l_result) (success) = false; \
377  if (printPass || !(l_result)) { \
378  out << #a"["<<i<<"] = " << Teuchos::toString((a)[i]) << " == "#val" = " << Teuchos::toString(val) \
379  << " : " << TEUCHOS_PASS_FAIL(l_result) << "\n"; \
380  } \
381  }
382 
383 
390 #define TEUCHOS_TEST_ARRAY_ELE_INEQUALITY( a, i, val, printPass, out, success ) \
391  { \
392  const bool l_result = ( (a)[i] != (val) ); \
393  if (!l_result) (success) = false; \
394  if (printPass || !(l_result)) { \
395  out << #a"["<<i<<"] = " << Teuchos::toString((a)[i]) << " != "#val" = " << Teuchos::toString(val) \
396  << " : " << TEUCHOS_PASS_FAIL(l_result) << "\n"; \
397  } \
398  }
399 
400 
408 #define TEUCHOS_TEST_MATRIX_ELE_FLOATING_EQUALITY( a, i, j, val, tol, printPass, out, success ) \
409  { \
410  std::ostringstream a_i_str; \
411  a_i_str <<#a<<"("<<i<<","<<j<<")"; \
412  const bool l_result = Teuchos::testRelErr( \
413  a_i_str.str(), (a)(i,j), #val, val, "tol", tol, "tol", tol, \
414  (printPass) ? Teuchos::outArg(out) : Teuchos::null ); \
415  if (!l_result) (success) = false; \
416  }
417

425 #define TEUCHOS_TEST_MATRIX_ELE_EQUALITY( a, i, j, val, printPass, out, success ) \
426  { \
427  const bool l_result = ( (a)(i,j) == (val) ); \
428  if (!l_result) (success) = false; \
429  if (printPass || !(l_result)) { \
430  out << #a"("<<i<<","<<j<<") = " << (a)(i,j) << " == "#val" = " << (val) \
431  << " : " << TEUCHOS_PASS_FAIL(l_result) << "\n"; \
432  } \
433  }

442 #define TEUCHOS_TEST_COMPARE( v1, comp, v2, out, success ) \
443  { \
444  out << #v1" = "<<(v1)<<" "#comp" "#v2" = "<<(v2)<<" : "; \
445  const bool l_result = (v1) comp (v2); \
446  if (!l_result) (success) = false; \
447  (out) << TEUCHOS_PASS_FAIL(l_result) << "\n"; \
448  }

457 #define TEUCHOS_TEST_THROW( code, ExceptType, out, success ) \
458  try { \
459  (out) << "Test that code {"#code";} throws " \
460  <<Teuchos::TypeNameTraits<ExceptType>::name()<<": "; \
461  code; \
462  (success) = false; \
463  (out) << "failed\n"; \
464  } \
465  catch (const ExceptType& except) { \
466  out << "passed\n"; \
467  out << "\nException message for expected exception:\n\n"; \
468  { \
469  Teuchos::OSTab l_tab(out); \
470  out << except.what() << "\n\n"; \
471  } \
472  }
473 
474 
481 #define TEUCHOS_TEST_NOTHROW( code, out, success ) \
482  try { \
483  (out) << "Test that code {"#code";} does not throw : "; \
484  code; \
485  (out) << "passes\n"; \
486  } \
487  catch (...) { \
488  (success) = false; \
489  out << "failed\n"; \
490  }

498 inline
499 void Teuchos::updateSuccess(const bool result, bool &success)
500 {
501  if (!result) success = false;
502 }
503 
504 
505 inline
506 const std::string
507 Teuchos::passfail(const bool result)
508 {
509  if (!result)
510  return "FAILED";
511  return "passed";
512 }
513 
514 
515 template <class Scalar>
516 typename Teuchos::ScalarTraits<Scalar>::magnitudeType
517 Teuchos::relErr( const Scalar &s1, const Scalar &s2 )
518 {
519  typedef Teuchos::ScalarTraits<Scalar> ST;
520  return
521  ST::magnitude( s1 - s2 )
522  / (
523  ST::magnitude(
524  RelErrSmallNumber<ST::hasMachineParameters,Scalar>::smallNumber()
525  )
526  + std::max( ST::magnitude(s1), ST::magnitude(s2) )
527  );
528 }
529 
530 
531 template<class Scalar>
532 bool Teuchos::testRelErr(
533  const std::string &v1_name,
534  const Scalar &v1,
535  const std::string &v2_name,
536  const Scalar &v2,
537  const std::string &maxRelErr_error_name,
538  const typename Teuchos::ScalarTraits<Scalar>::magnitudeType &maxRelErr_error,
539  const std::string &maxRelErr_warning_name,
540  const typename Teuchos::ScalarTraits<Scalar>::magnitudeType &maxRelErr_warning,
541  const Ptr<std::ostream> &out
542  )
543 {
544  using std::endl;
545  typedef ScalarTraits<Scalar> ST;
546  typedef typename ST::magnitudeType ScalarMag;
547  typedef ScalarTraits<ScalarMag> SMT;
548  const ScalarMag rel_err = relErr( v1, v2 );
549  const bool success = ( !SMT::isnaninf(rel_err) && !SMT::isnaninf(maxRelErr_error)
550  && rel_err <= maxRelErr_error );
551  if (!is_null(out)) {
552  *out
553  << endl
554  << "Check: rel_err(" << v1_name << ", " << v2_name << ")\n"
555  << " = rel_err(" << v1 << ", " << v2 << ") "
556  << "= " << rel_err << endl
557  << " <= " << maxRelErr_error_name
558  << " = " << maxRelErr_error << " : " << passfail(success) << endl;
559  if( success && rel_err >= maxRelErr_warning ) {
560  *out
561  << "Warning! rel_err(" << v1_name << ", " << v2_name << ")\n"
562  << " = rel_err(" << v1 << ", " << v2 << ") "
563  << "= " << rel_err << endl
564  << " >= " << maxRelErr_warning_name
565  << " = " << maxRelErr_warning << "!\n";
566  }
567  }
568  return success;
569 }
570 
571 
572 template<class Array1, class Array2>
573 bool Teuchos::compareArrays(
574  const Array1 &a1, const std::string &a1_name,
575  const Array2 &a2, const std::string &a2_name,
576  Teuchos::FancyOStream &out
577  )
578 {
579  using Teuchos::as;
580  bool success = true;
581 
582  out << "Comparing " << a1_name << " == " << a2_name << " ... ";
583 
584  const int n = a1.size();
585 
586  // Compare sizes
587  if (as<int>(a2.size()) != n) {
588  out << "\nError, "<<a1_name<<".size() = "<<a1.size()<<" == "
589  << a2_name<<".size() = "<<a2.size()<<" : failed!\n";
590  return false;
591  }
592 
593  // Compare elements
594  for( int i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
595  const bool result = ( a1[i] == a2[i] ); // Tests C::operator[](i) const
596  if (!result) {
597  out << "\nError, "<<a1_name<<"["<<i<<"] = "<<a1[i]<<" == "
598  << a2_name<<"["<<i<<"] = "<<a2[i]<<": failed!\n";
599  success = false;
600  }
601  }
602  if (success) {
603  out << "passed\n";
604  }
605 
606  return success;
607 
608 }
609 
610 
611 template<class Array1, class Array2, class ScalarMag>
612 bool Teuchos::compareFloatingArrays(
613  const Array1 &a1, const std::string &a1_name,
614  const Array2 &a2, const std::string &a2_name,
615  const ScalarMag &tol,
616  Teuchos::FancyOStream &out
617  )
618 {
619  using Teuchos::as;
620  bool success = true;
621 
622  out << "Comparing " << a1_name << " == " << a2_name << " ... ";
623 
624  const int n = a1.size();
625 
626  // Compare sizes
627  if (as<int>(a2.size()) != n) {
628  out << "\nError, "<<a1_name<<".size() = "<<a1.size()<<" == "
629  << a2_name<<".size() = "<<a2.size()<<" : failed!\n";
630  return false;
631  }
632 
633  // Compare elements
634  for( int i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
635  const ScalarMag err = relErr( a1[i], a2[i] );
636  if ( err > tol ) {
637  out
638  <<"\nError, relErr("<<a1_name<<"["<<i<<"],"
639  <<a2_name<<"["<<i<<"]) = relErr("<<a1[i]<<","<<a2[i]<<") = "
640  <<err<<" <= tol = "<<tol<<": failed!\n";
641  success = false;
642  }
643  }
644  if (success) {
645  out << "passed\n";
646  }
647 
648  return success;
649 
650 }
